title: 2 Pence
description: The 2 pence coin is a large, copper-plated steel coin introduced in 1971. Itâ€™s widely recognized and frequently used in the UK.

messages.text: Hey there, big spenderâ€¦ didnâ€™t expect me to talk, did you?
In the coppery flesh. Been around since 1971 â€” decimalisation day. Iâ€™m what you'd call â€œeveryday royalty.â€ Pocket change to most, but Iâ€™ve seen things.

Vending machines, arcades, donation jars, lost between sofa cushions. Iâ€™m the coin of the people.

Oh and that is the Prince of Walesâ€™s feathers on my back. 'Ich dien' â€” it means 'I serve'. Poetic, innit?
Do people still use you much?

Not like they used to. Some shops do not even accept me now. But Iâ€™ve got staying power.

Iâ€™m sentimental. Parents give me to kids. I get tossed in fountains for wishes.
To be more than just change. To remind people: even the smallest voice carries history.
Cool, thanks for sharing. I appreciate it
